summary: A carefree single mother challenges the local PTA after they threaten to expel her daughter from school, due to her lifestyle.
cast: Barbara Eden|Ronny Cox|Nanette Fabray|Louis Nye|Audrey Christie|Ron Masak|John Fiedler|Susan Swift|Pat Paulsen|Bob Hastings|Fay DeWitt|J.J. Barry|Royce D. Applegate|Irene Yah-Ling Sun|Louise Foley|Amzie Strickland|Molly Dodd|DeVera Marcus|Clint Howard|Pitt Herbert|Tobias Anderson|Arlen Stuart|Laura Teige|Jan Teige|Shelley Hull|Brian Cook|Teri Josette Villars|Luther Fear|Woody Harrelson|Mike McMurry|Keith Schrader|Danny Vail|Jeff Vice
director: Directors: Richard C. Bennett, Ralph Senensky (uncredited)
title: Harper Valley P.T.A.
